texts.biography: Usually someone as taciturn as Jonathan is rather not a good leader. This time, however, the exception proves the rule and as a result Kastore's army gained a great general.
texts.name: Jonathan

specialty.name: Shield Bearers
specialty.description: Increases the speed of Shield Bearers or Pavise Bearers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills for each level attained after 1st level.
